statements: UPDATE camera_calibration SET sensor_width = 36.0, sensor_height = 24.0 WHERE camera_model = 'Canon EOS 5D Mark IV'
UPDATE camera_calibration SET focal_length = 50.0, distortion_coefficients = '1.2, -0.8, 0.3' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE camera_calibration SET focal_length = 50.0, principal_point_x = 100.0, sensor_height = 20.0 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE camera_calibration SET sensor_width = 30.0, distortion_coefficients = '0.1,0.2,0.3' WHERE camera_model = 'Canon EOS R';
UPDATE camera_calibration_parameters SET principal_point_x = 100, principal_point_y = 150, focal_length = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE geometric_transformations SET translation_vector = '{"x": 10, "y": 20}', rotation_matrix = '[1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1]' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE camera_calibration_parameters SET principal_point_x = 500, distortion_coefficients = '{"k1": 0.1, "k2": 0.2}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE geometric_transformations SET transformation_matrix = '{"key1": [1, 0, 0], "key2": [0, 1, 0], "key3": [0, 0, 1]}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE camera_calibrations SET focal_length = 35.0, principal_point_x = 400.0 WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE distortion_parameters SET k1 = 0.01, k2 = 0.02 WHERE distortion_id = 1;
UPDATE camera_calibrations SET focal_length = 35.4, principal_point_x = -10.2 WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE distortion_parameters SET k1 = 0.02, k2 = 0.05 WHERE distortion_id = 2;
UPDATE camera_calibrations SET fx = 0.5, fy = 0.6, cx = 0.7, cy = 0.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE distortion_coefficients SET k1 = -0.1, k2 = 0.2, p1 = 0.1 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE camera_calibrations SET fx=0.5, fy=0.6 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE distortion_coefficients SET k1=0.01, k2=-0.02, p1=0.005 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE CameraParameters SET fx=0.5, fy=0.6 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ImageMetadata SET image_name='example_image.jpg', capture_timestamp='2023-06-15 08:00:00', camera_id=2 WHERE id=5;
UPDATE CameraParameters SET fx = 3.14, fy = 2.71, cy = 0.09 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DistortionParameters SET k1 = -0.10, p2 = 0.05, k3 = 0.03 WHERE id = 2;
